event.description: Ichiro Suzuki lines out to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Endy Chavez singles on a line drive to center fielder Denard Span.
Jose Lopez strikes out swinging.
With Russell Branyan batting, Endy Chavez steals (6) 2nd base.
Russell Branyan strikes out swinging.
Adrian Beltre pops out to catcher Joe Mauer in foul territory.
Ken Griffey strikes out swinging.
Kenji Johjima singles on a ground ball to center fielder Denard Span.
Franklin Gutierrez grounds out, third baseman Brian Buscher to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Yuniesky Betancourt flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Ichiro Suzuki grounds out, second baseman Matt Tolbert to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Endy Chavez grounds out, shortstop Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Jose Lopez pops out to catcher Joe Mauer in foul territory.
Russell Branyan strikes out swinging.
Adrian Beltre grounds out, third baseman Brian Buscher to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Ken Griffey flies out to center fielder Denard Span.
Kenji Johjima grounds out softly, pitcher Scott Baker to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Franklin Gutierrez pops out to second baseman Matt Tolbert in foul territory.
Yuniesky Betancourt singles on a ground ball to center fielder Denard Span.
Ichiro Suzuki singles on a ground ball to right fielder Michael Cuddyer. Yuniesky Betancourt to 2nd.
Endy Chavez flies out to left fielder Delmon Young.
Jose Lopez pops out to shortstop Brendan Harris on the infield fly rule.
Russell Branyan lines out to center fielder Denard Span.
Defensive switch from center field to right field for Denard Span.
Carlos Gomez remains in the game as the center fielder.
Adrian Beltre singles on a line drive to left fielder Delmon Young.
Ken Griffey flies out to right fielder Denard Span.
Kenji Johjima grounds out, shortstop Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau. Adrian Beltre to 2nd.
Franklin Gutierrez strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Jesse Crain replaces Scott Baker.
Yuniesky Betancourt flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Ichiro Suzuki flies out to left fielder Delmon Young.
Endy Chavez grounds out, second baseman Matt Tolbert to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Pitching Change: Joe Nathan replaces Jesse Crain.
Jose Lopez lines out to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Russell Branyan called out on strikes.
Adrian Beltre strikes out swinging.
Denard Span singles on a line drive to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Matt Tolbert hits a ground-rule double (1) on a fly ball to left-center field. Denard Span to 3rd.
Joe Mauer grounds out, second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan. Denard Span scores. Matt Tolbert to 3rd.
Justin Morneau out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez. Matt Tolbert scores.
Jason Kubel grounds out, shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Michael Cuddyer flies out to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Brian Buscher walks.
Delmon Young walks. Brian Buscher to 2nd.
Brendan Harris homers (2) on a fly ball to right field. Brian Buscher scores. Delmon Young scores.
Denard Span grounds out, shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Matt Tolbert grounds out, shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Joe Mauer grounds out to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Justin Morneau flies out to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Jason Kubel doubles (9) on a sharp fly ball to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Michael Cuddyer flies out to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Brian Buscher grounds out, second baseman Jose Lopez to pitcher Chris Jakubauskas.
Delmon Young singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Adrian Beltre.
With Brendan Harris batting, throwing error by Chris Jakubauskas on the pickoff attempt, Delmon Young to 2nd.
Brendan Harris grounds out, second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan. Delmon Young to 3rd.
Denard Span lines out to pitcher Chris Jakubauskas.
Matt Tolbert flies out to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Joe Mauer homers (2) on a fly ball to left field.
Justin Morneau homers (7) on a fly ball to right field.
Jason Kubel walks.
Michael Cuddyer singles on a line drive to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez. Jason Kubel to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Miguel Batista replaces Chris Jakubauskas.
Brian Buscher homers (1) on a fly ball to right field. Jason Kubel scores. Michael Cuddyer scores.
Delmon Young flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Brendan Harris singles on a fly ball to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Denard Span grounds out to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Matt Tolbert walks.
Joe Mauer singles on a ground ball to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki. Matt Tolbert to 2nd.
Justin Morneau walks. Matt Tolbert to 3rd. Joe Mauer to 2nd.
Jason Kubel out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Endy Chavez in foul territory. Matt Tolbert scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Carlos Gomez replaces Michael Cuddyer.
Carlos Gomez grounds out, second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan. Joe Mauer to 3rd. Justin Morneau to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Jason Vargas replaces Miguel Batista.
Brian Buscher pops out to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt.
Delmon Young singles on a fly ball to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
